verses.verse: וַיֵּ֥רַע <S%H7489><s%> vai-Ye-ra' displeased אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- about יוֹנָ֖ה <S%H3124><s%> yo-Nah Jonah רָעָ֣ה <S%H7451><s%> ra-'Ah adversity גְדוֹלָ֑ה <S%H1419><s%> ge-do-Lah; greatly וַיִּ֖חַר <S%H2734><s%> vai-Yi-char and he was very angry לֽוֹ׃ lo.

וְעַתָּ֣ה <S%H6258><s%> ve-'at-Tah now יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh, Therefore now O LORD קַח־ <S%H3947><s%> kach- take נָ֥א <S%H4994><s%> na please אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- נַפְשִׁ֖י <S%H5315><s%> naf-Shi I beseech thee my life מִמֶּ֑נִּי <S%H4480><s%> mi-Men-ni; than כִּ֛י <S%H3588><s%> ki for ט֥וֹב <S%H2896><s%> Tov from me for [it is] better מוֹתִ֖י <S%H4194><s%> mo-Ti for me to die מֵחַיָּֽי׃ <S%H2416><s%> me-chai-Yai. than to live ס sa-Mek
וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-mer Then said יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh, the LORD הַהֵיטֵ֖ב <S%H3190><s%> ha-hei-Tev Doest thou well חָ֥רָה <S%H2734><s%> Cha-rah to be angry לָֽךְ׃ Lach.

וַיֵּצֵ֤א <S%H3318><s%> vai-ye-Tze went out יוֹנָה֙ <S%H3124><s%> yo-Nah So Jonah מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> min- from הָעִ֔יר <S%H5892><s%> ha-'Ir, of the city וַיֵּ֖שֶׁב <S%H3427><s%> vai-Ye-shev and sat מִקֶּ֣דֶם <S%H6924><s%> mik-Ke-dem on the east side לָעִ֑יר <S%H5892><s%> la-'Ir; of the city וַיַּעַשׂ֩ <S%H6213><s%> vai-ya-'As and there made ל֨וֹ lo שָׁ֜ם <S%H8033><s%> sham There סֻכָּ֗ה <S%H5521><s%> suk-Kah, him a booth וַיֵּ֤שֶׁב <S%H3427><s%> vai-Ye-shev and sat תַּחְתֶּ֙יהָ֙ <S%H8478><s%> tach-Tei-ha under בַּצֵּ֔ל <S%H6738><s%> batz-Tzel, under it in the shadow עַ֚ד <S%H5704><s%> 'ad against אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher he יִרְאֶ֔ה <S%H7200><s%> yir-'Eh, till he might see מַה־ <S%H4100><s%> mah- what יִּהְיֶ֖ה <S%H1961><s%> yih-Yeh happen בָּעִֽיר׃ <S%H5892><s%> ba-'Ir. what would become of the city

וַיְמַ֣ן <S%H4487><s%> vay-Man prepared יְהוָֽה־ <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh- And the LORD אֱ֠לֹהִים <S%H430><s%> E-lo-Him God קִיקָי֞וֹן <S%H7021><s%> ki-ka-Yon a gourd וַיַּ֣עַל׀ <S%H5927><s%> vai-Ya-'al and made [it] to come up מֵעַ֣ל <S%H5921><s%> me-'Al over לְיוֹנָ֗ה <S%H3124><s%> le-yo-Nah, over Jonah לִֽהְי֥וֹת <S%H1961><s%> lih-Yot to be a צֵל֙ <S%H6738><s%> tzel that it might be a shadow עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- about רֹאשׁ֔וֹ <S%H7218><s%> ro-Sho, over his head לְהַצִּ֥יל <S%H5337><s%> le-hatz-Tzil to deliver ל֖וֹ lo מֵרָֽעָת֑וֹ <S%H7451><s%> me-ra-'a-To; him from his grief וַיִּשְׂמַ֥ח <S%H8055><s%> vai-yis-Mach glad יוֹנָ֛ה <S%H3124><s%> yo-Nah So Jonah עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- over הַקִּֽיקָי֖וֹן <S%H7021><s%> hak-ki-ka-Yon of the gourd שִׂמְחָ֥ה <S%H8056><s%> sim-Chah glad גְדוֹלָֽה׃ <S%H1419><s%> ge-do-Lah. aloud

וַיְמַ֤ן <S%H4487><s%> vay-Man prepared הָֽאֱלֹהִים֙ <S%H430><s%> ha-'E-lo-Him But God תּוֹלַ֔עַת <S%H8438><s%> to-La-'at, a worm בַּעֲל֥וֹת <S%H5927><s%> ba-'a-Lot rose הַשַּׁ֖חַר <S%H7837><s%> hash-Sha-char when the morning לַֽמָּחֳרָ֑ת <S%H4283><s%> lam-mo-cho-Rat; the next day וַתַּ֥ךְ <S%H5221><s%> vat-Tach and it smote אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- הַקִּֽיקָי֖וֹן <S%H7021><s%> hak-ki-ka-Yon the gourd וַיִּיבָֽשׁ׃ <S%H3001><s%> vai-yi-Vash. that it withered

וַיְהִ֣י׀ <S%H1961><s%> vay-Hi become כִּזְרֹ֣חַ <S%H2224><s%> kiz-Ro-ach did arise הַשֶּׁ֗מֶשׁ <S%H8121><s%> hash-She-mesh, And it came to pass when the sun וַיְמַ֨ן <S%H4487><s%> vay-Man prepared אֱלֹהִ֜ים <S%H430><s%> E-lo-Him that God ר֤וּחַ <S%H7307><s%> Ru-ach wind קָדִים֙ <S%H6921><s%> ka-Dim east חֲרִישִׁ֔ית <S%H2759><s%> cha-ri-Shit, a vehement וַתַּ֥ךְ <S%H5221><s%> vat-Tach beat הַשֶּׁ֛מֶשׁ <S%H8121><s%> hash-She-mesh and the sun עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- and רֹ֥אשׁ <S%H7218><s%> rosh upon the head יוֹנָ֖ה <S%H3124><s%> yo-Nah of Jonah וַיִּתְעַלָּ֑ף <S%H5968><s%> vai-yit-'al-Laf; that he fainted וַיִּשְׁאַ֤ל <S%H7592><s%> vai-yish-'Al and wished אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- נַפְשׁוֹ֙ <S%H5315><s%> naf-Sho in himself לָמ֔וּת <S%H4191><s%> la-Mut, to die וַיֹּ֕אמֶר <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-mer and said ט֥וֹב <S%H2896><s%> Tov [It is] better מוֹתִ֖י <S%H4191><s%> mo-Ti to die מֵחַיָּֽי׃ <S%H2416><s%> me-chai-Yai. than to live

[even] unto death

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-mer Then said יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh, the LORD אַתָּ֥ה <S%H859><s%> 'at-Tah You חַ֙סְתָּ֙ <S%H2347><s%> chas-ta Thou hast had pity עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- on הַקִּ֣יקָי֔וֹן <S%H7021><s%> hak-Ki-ka-Yon, on the gourd אֲשֶׁ֛ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher which לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> lo- did not עָמַ֥לְתָּ <S%H5998><s%> 'a-Mal-ta for the which thou hast not laboured בּ֖וֹ bo וְלֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> ve-Lo cause גִדַּלְתּ֑וֹ <S%H1431><s%> gid-dal-To; neither madest it grow שֶׁבִּן־ <S%H1121><s%> sheb-bin- afflicted לַ֥יְלָה <S%H3915><s%> Lay-lah night הָיָ֖ה <S%H1961><s%> ha-Yah came וּבִן־ <S%H1121><s%> u-vin- afflicted לַ֥יְלָה <S%H3915><s%> Lay-lah night אָבָֽד׃ <S%H6><s%> 'a-Vad. and perished

וַֽאֲנִי֙ <S%H589><s%> va-'a-Ni I לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> lo not אָח֔וּס <S%H2347><s%> 'a-Chus, And should not I spare עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- and נִינְוֵ֖ה <S%H5210><s%> nin-Veh Nineveh הָעִ֣יר <S%H5892><s%> ha-'Ir city הַגְּדוֹלָ֑ה <S%H1419><s%> hag-ge-do-Lah; that great אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher who יֶשׁ־ <S%H3426><s%> yesh- wherein are בָּ֡הּ bah הַרְבֵּה֩ <S%H7235><s%> har-Beh more מִֽשְׁתֵּים־ <S%H8147><s%> mish-teim- both עֶשְׂרֵ֨ה <S%H6240><s%> 'es-Reh ten רִבּ֜וֹ <S%H7239><s%> rib-Bo thousand אָדָ֗ם <S%H120><s%> 'a-Dam, persons אֲשֶׁ֤ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher who לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> lo- not יָדַע֙ <S%H3045><s%> ya-Da' that cannot discern בֵּין־ <S%H996><s%> bein- between יְמִינ֣וֹ <S%H3225><s%> ye-mi-No between their right hand לִשְׂמֹאל֔וֹ <S%H8040><s%> lis-mo-Lo, and their left hand וּבְהֵמָ֖ה <S%H929><s%> u-ve-he-Mah beast רַבָּֽה׃ <S%H7227><s%> rab-Bah. and [also] much
